text:
subAppend method is referencing LoggingEvent.message field that is not visible 
since it is declared as private.
Solution modify code to be:
	  out.write(event.getRenderedMessage());
creator: gorankukol@yahoo.com
cgu@qos.ch
text: Sorry but how does it compile then?
By the way, TempFileAppender is not part of the official distribution, right?
creator: cgu@qos.ch
gorankukol@yahoo.com
text:
If official distribution is only log4j.jar and log4j-core.jar then you are 
right. I am still not clear why code with error are distribued if they are part 
of contribution list? Also how contribution code can share packages with core 
packages? Anyway I will change the status of the bug into INVALID. OK?
